lines.text: Here it is... Virginia City, my kind of town.
What constitutes your kind of town?
Any place I can get rid of you!
I'm not crazy about our odds, Duchess, but I like the company!
Mormons never kill.
That's why there are so many of the little buggers.
God, oh my God, you're hurt! Is there much pain?
It doesn't even hurt. What did you think? That I'd fall apart with one lousy bullet?
How many times have you been hit by bullets, Malloy?
Including this one?
Yeah.
Once.
Hold it! Hold it! Hold it! Now let's not get carried away with blood lust. Where is our cup of human kindness? Where's it runneth to?
It runneth right up your ass, that's where it's runneth to! Somebody get a rope!
I think we're safe.
You thought taking the money was going to be a cinch, too.
Taking the money was a cinch. It's keeping it that's getting to be a pain in the ass!
You know something? A man has got to know what he wants in life. Ain't that right, Duchess?
Sure, Charlie.
And a man has to fight for what he wants. Ain't that right?
Sure, Charlie.
That's why I'm going back and get my money.
What!
I stole it fair and square and nobody is going to take it away from me!
You just shot a man, Malloy!
No shit!
How many men have you shot dead in your life?
Including this one?
Yeah.
One.
Duchess, how many times have you been in love?
Including this time?
Uh-huh.
Once.
